name: customers_expected_downsell_managed
description:
The total number of Managed customers with an open Renew Opportunity that has a positive probability (> 0),  and the expected Delta ARR is negative (< 0), indicating a negative change in ARR (Annual Recurring Revenue)  during a given time period. This metric is intended to be reported at the fiscal-quarter-grain or higher, 
therefore, dimension values replace native time grains in this metric definition.
